fullText:
Swift Predator

Epic Tier
Prerequisite: 21st level, druid, Primal Predator class feature, wild shape power
Benefit: While you are in beast form, you gain a +1 feat bonus to speed, and whenever you shift, you can increase the distance by 1 square.

Published in Primal Power, page(s) 148.
name: Swift Predator
prerequisite: 21st level, druid, Primal Predator class feature, wild shape power
benefit: While you are in beast form, you gain a +1 feat bonus to speed, and whenever you shift, you can increase the distance by 1 square.
